static_fields.name: Discover Horizon Rubber | Minase Watches | Made in Japan
static_fields.description: Horizon rubber is powered with a high quality Swiss movement, every steel parts is hand-polished with the Sallaz (sarazu) technique.

hasVariant.name: Horizon Rubber - Black
hasVariant.description: Horizon is a tribute to Japan. The overall watch looks calm and peaceful. Yet if you look at the sides, there is something strong, powerful and virile. The finishing of the sides was inspired by the Katana, the famous samurai sword.

offers.description: Horizon is a tribute to Japan. The overall watch looks calm and peaceful. Yet if you look at the sides, there is something strong, powerful and virile. The finishing of the sides was inspired by the Katana, the famous samurai sword.
